body_html: This is due to Variable has a specific python method in variable.py to handle this. After discussing with @colesbury , we think that it would be best to solve this when we add support for calling these methods on multiple dims.
body_text: This is due to Variable has a specific python method in variable.py to handle this. After discussing with @colesbury , we think that it would be best to solve this when we add support for calling these methods on multiple dims.
body: This is due to Variable has a specific python method in `variable.py` to handle this. After discussing with @colesbury , we think that it would be best to solve this when we add support for calling these methods on multiple dims.
